alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:49PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Walton County through 215 PM CDT... At 148 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eglin Air Force Base, or 10 miles northeast of Niceville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, New Home, Portland, Pleasant Ridge and Rock Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
